name: part_012
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Takanashi Kiara 4th Anniversary Live ~「MIRAGE」WITH A SURPRISE!？ #Kiara4years [0LoG81pLS8c]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Takanashi Kiara performs the final part of her song 'CHIMERA'.
Kiara takes a break and addresses the audience in an MC segment, introducing her new song.
Kiara performs her new song 'MIRAGE' for the first time, accompanied by backup dancers.

subtitles.original: So, with the next song, it'll actually be the last song.
subtitles.english: So, with the next song, it'll actually be the last song.

subtitles.original: But this one is a very special one because
subtitles.english: But this one is a very special one because

subtitles.original: for the first time ever, you will hear my next song, "MIRAGE".
subtitles.english: for the first time ever, you will hear my next song, "MIRAGE".

subtitles.original: And for this one, what's really special is,
subtitles.english: And for this one, what's really special is,

subtitles.original: for the first time ever, I'm bringing in
subtitles.english: for the first time ever, I'm bringing in

subtitles.original: some back-up dancers, back-dancers,

subtitles.original: who are gonna join me.

subtitles.original: So, please enjoy.

subtitles.original: And afterwards, the MV will be released.
subtitles.english: And afterwards, the MV will be released.

subtitles.original: So, hopefully everything goes according to plan.

subtitles.original: So, please make sure to check that out too

subtitles.original: and support my new song...
